product.name: 3 Light Mid Century Modern Gold Globe semi Flush Mount Ceiling Brass Chandelier 3-Light Milk Glass Globe Lights Sputnik Ceiling Light Fixture for Bedroom Living Room Hallway
product.description:
Sputnik Ceiling Light
Black Chandelier
Clear Glass Ceiling Light
Gold Ceiling Light
Modern Light Fixtures
Globe Ceiling Lights
Gold Chandelier
We have a wide range of products including pendant lights, ceiling lights, woven lights, crystal chandelier ,fan lights and more.
We focus on the integration and innovation of lighting into modern life.
We provide our customers with a more reliable, convenient and user-friendly service.
We ensure the quality and safety of every luminaire product.
product.bullet_points:
• [Mid-Century Modern Ceiling Globe Light] This gold mid-century modern style ceiling globe light has a diameter of 17.5 inches and a height of 7.5 inches. The diameter of each globe shade is 6 inches and the diameter of the ceiling plate is 5 inches.
• [Style and Design] The shade used for this product is a milk white shade, and the pole part of the lamp is made of polished electroplated metal, the pole is solid and durable. The size of the ceiling tray is large enough to cover the ceiling mounting holes, which is more beautiful and practical. The overall shape of this lamp is simple and smooth, which can add a stylish and elegant atmosphere to your home.
• [3*G45 Bulbs Included] This mid-century modern ceiling globe light includes 3*G45 bulbs, so you don't need to buy another bulb to match. Meanwhile, we recommend you to use G45 bulbs and E26 bulbs.
• [Dimmable] This product is warm yellow light effect, you can use dimmable bulbs and compatible dimmer switch together, can achieve dimming effect, from 10%-100% can adjust the light freely.
• [ Professional Quality Assurance Service ] We are committed to providing you with high quality lights and sincere service! No matter you encounter any problems after purchasing the product, you can tell us at any time. We will provide solutions for you as soon as possible.
